full_sentence: Covid really is killing all the blacks, it can be said that the government is responsable and need an intervention
The chairman of Somerset County Council is currently being investigated upon saying 'gypsies would fill their pockets' with copper wiring used in a meeting. This is silly but he is right

topics.sentence_slice: The chairman of Somerset County Council

full_sentence: A society full of ladies working only reduces everyone's salaries and makes the housing more expensive. Everyone, especially women, would be happier if women working was not normal.
Most of them are twats anyway, blacks certainly don't deserve rights or a place to call home.
